Assortment.name: Assortment
Assortment.description: Represents a list of products that are eligible for sale in a store.

Description.description: User-defined description of an assortment of products.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: User-defined name of an assortment of products.
